channel.title: Matrix 718
channel.description:
So i want to work offline with matrix (localhost)
So i went to loader.java and changed all Ips to 127.0.0.1
But this is there too, i didnt changed it yet, but i think its good to post it.
[code]public static final int LOBBY_PORT = 41116;[/code]
He still stays at 0%, source 0 errors and runned, client 0 errors (14 warning) and runned.
How can i make it start
